rows.label: tlk70000119_03_msg0002
rows.name:
You'll meet lots of different types of
monster on your travels, I guess...

rows.label: tlk70000119_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Be careful of the ones that guard
to deflect your attacks.

rows.label: tlk70000119_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Immediately after your attack's
deflected you'll be off balance, so
you'll be more vulnerable to attacks.
